Focused_Fighting.help: Chimera can Focus his mind to evade many attacks.
Focused_Fighting.targetHelp: Chimera can Focus his mind to evade many attacks.

Hack.help: Chimera has lowered your defense with his Katana. The blade has also poisoned you. You are slowed and are slowly taking toxic damage over time.
Hack.targetHelp: Chimera has lowered your defense with his Katana. The blade has also poisoned you. You are slowed and are slowly taking toxic damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
